text:
-ndriqyENApa# krAmatiq varu#Na EnaM ~MvaruNapAqSEna# gRuhNAtiq yaH pAqpmanA# gRuhIqtO Bava#tiq yaH pAqpmanA# gRuhIqtaH syAt tasmA# EqtAmai$ndrAvaruqNIM pa#yaqsyA$M nirva#pEqdindra# EqvAsmi#nnindriqyaM da#dhAtiq varu#Na EnaM 
~MvaruNapAqSAn-mu#~jcati payaqsyA# Bavatiq payOq hi vA EqtasmA#dapaqkrAmaqtyathaiqSha pAqpmanA# gRuhIqtO yat pa#yaqsyA# Bava#tiq paya# EqvAsmiqn tayA# dadhAti payaqsyA#yAM - [  ]  49
